variants.Description in input context: c.255A>G (p.Lys85Glu) causes a significant reduction in SMN protein levels.

Material used.Material Name: Neuro-2a cells transfected with SMN1 mutant cDNA
Material used.Description: Neuro-2a cells were transfected with a plasmid containing the SMN1 mutant cDNA containing the c.255A>G mutation.  Control cells were transfected with wild-type SMN1 cDNA.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot analysis showed a ~70% reduction in SMN protein levels in cells transfected with the mutant cDNA compared to cells transfected with wild-type cDNA. Densitometry was performed to quantify band intensity.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent transfections and protein isolations were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate on the Western blot.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells transfected with wild-type SMN1 cDNA served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with an empty vector (no cDNA) served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to determine statistical significance (p < 0.05).

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels between 80% and 120% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels below 80% or above 120% of control.

Material used.Material Name: Neuro-2a cells transfected with SMN1 mutant cDNA
Material used.Description: RNA was extracted from Neuro-2a cells transfected with the mutant and wild-type cDNA.

Readout description.Result Description: qRT-PCR analysis showed a ~50% reduction in SMN mRNA transcript levels in cells transfected with the mutant cDNA compared to cells transfected with wild-type cDNA.  Normalization was performed using GAPDH.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent transfections and RNA extractions were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate in qRT-PCR.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SMN1 cDNA transfected cells were the positive control

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfected cells were the negative control

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Studentâ€™s t-test to confirm statistical significance

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: mRNA transcript level expression within 10% of control expression levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: mRNA transcript expression that is >10% of the expression level of the control cells
